item.title: 5.5.1 Introduction
item.description: ‚ùó This is a report on Vietnam Standards (QCVN) of the Ministry of Transport. To view these reports, the device needs to have a License Plate, Enable Send data to the Department of Transport in the advanced settings of the device.. üëâ You can refer to here

item.title: 5.5.2 Journey
item.description: QCVN31-Route # If the user wants to see the QCVN31-Route Report, do the following: Click on Reports > Ministry of transport > Journey. Search # Step 1: Search by the following criteria: Date: Select an available or optional time. Number plate: Select a number plate you want to see the journey of the car. Step 2: Click Search to find results.

item.title: 5.5.3 Speed
item.description: QCVN31-Speed # If the user wants to see the QCVN31-Speed Report do the following: Click on Reports > Ministry of transport > Speed. Search # Step 1: Search by the following criteria: Date: Select an available or optional time. Number plate: Select a license plate you want to see the speed per second. Step 2: Click Search to find results.

item.title: 5.5.4 Over Speed
item.description: QCVN31-Over speed limit # If the user wants to see the Report QCVN31-Over speed limit do the following: Click on Reports > Ministry of transport > Over speed limit . Search # Step 1: Search by the following criteria: Date: Select an available or optional time. Number plate: Select a number plate you want to see. Step 2: Click Search to find results.

item.title: 5.5.5 Driving
item.description: QCVN31-Driving time # If the user wants to see the QCVN31-Driving time Report, do the following: Click on Reports > Ministry of transport > Driving time. Search # Step 1: Search by the following criteria: Date: Select an available or optional time. Number plate: Select a number plate you want to see. Tick on Too 4 hour to see the continuous driving time more than 4h.

item.title: 5.5.6 Driving Device
item.description: QCVN31-Driving time (Device) # If the user wants to see the Report QCVN31-Driving time (Device), do the following: Click on Reports > Ministry of transport > Driving time (Device). Search # Step 1: Search by the following criteria: Date: Select an available or optional time. Number plate: Select a number plate you want to see. Tick on Too 4 hour to see the continuous driving time more than 4h.

item.title: 5.5.7 Stop
item.description: QCVN31-Stop parked # If the user wants to see the Report QCVN31-Stop parked do the following: Click on Reports > Ministry of transport > Stop parked. Search # Step 1: Search by the following criteria: Date: Select an available or optional time. Number plate: Select a number plate you want to see. Step 2: Click Search to find results.

item.title: 5.5.8 Summary by Vehicle
item.description: QCVN31-Summary by vehicle # If the user wants to see the Report QCVN31-Summary by vehicle do the following: Click on Reports > Ministry of transport > Summary by vehicle. Search # Step 1: Search by the following criteria: Date: Select an available or optional time. Number plate: Select a number plate you want to see. Step 2: Click Search to find results.

item.title: 5.5.9 Summary by Driver
item.description: QCVN31-Summary by driver # If the user wants to see the Report QCVN31-Summary by driver do the following: Click on Reports > Ministry of transport > Summary by driver. Search # Step 1: Search by the following criteria: Date: Select an available or optional time. Number plate: Select a number plate you want to see. Step 2: Click Search to find results.

item.title: 5.5.10 Driving on Day
item.description: QCVN31-Driving on day # If the user wants to see the Report QCVN31-Driving on day do the following: Click on Reports > Ministry of transport > Driving on day. Search # Step 1: Search by the following criteria: Date: Select an available or optional time. Number plate: Select a number plate you want to see. Tick on Too 10 hour to see the driving time of the day past 10 hour.
